name: Dunkirk Land the plane
description:
As the title says, land the plane on the beach IF. YOU. CAN.

This game has been inspired from the landing scene of the movie Dunkirk by Christopher Nolan

Credits
  • Press Start 2P - CodeMan38 - [Font]
  • I made the 8-bit style music with Ableton Live 10. As you can tell, it was inspired by Hans Zimmer's artwork - [Music]
  • Pixel-art was made with aseprite and pixelorama - [Pixel Art]
  • Alos great thanks to the Godot community 😉
Misc

You can find the core project of this game with the code for the physics on my github here
